definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
to conceal/to hide behind/to cover up
knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
to seal (with official stamp)/to stamp/fig. to ratify/to put lid on (cooking pot)/to cap/to build an extension or additional storey
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
flip-top (mobile phone, handbag etc)/to rebuild/to renovate

sentences.english: Clear glass cover allows observation of interior mechanism to aid in setting and checkout.
sentences.chinese: 透明玻璃蓋允許觀察內部機制，以幫助確定和檢驗。

sentences.english: Finally, the Shanxi mature vinegar poured into the old, will cover the storage cap.
sentences.chinese: 最後把山西老陳醋倒入，將瓶蓋蓋好存放。

sentences.english: Dear Colleagues, It gives me great pleasure to co-chair the third round of the China-US Economic Dialogue together with Secretary Geithner.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興與蓋特納財長共同主持第三輪中美經濟對話。

sentences.english: A charter is a mask; the lie lurks beneath it.
sentences.chinese: 憲章是個假面具，蓋在那下面的是謊話。

sentences.english: The workers torn down the old house and built a new one in its place.
sentences.chinese: 工人們拆毀舊屋，並在原址上另蓋新屋。

sentences.english: Geithner noted similar concerns in his speech this week.
sentences.chinese: 蓋特納在這周的演講中表達了同樣的擔心。

sentences.english: In the desert Bridgit gives Gaines the ID.
sentences.chinese: 在沙漠中，布瑞吉特將馬丁的身份證交給了蓋恩斯。

sentences.english: On Thursday only 168 flights passed through Gatwick.
sentences.chinese: 週四，只有168架航班通過蓋特維克機場。

sentences.english: The door cover of the host can be opened for convenience of cutters.
sentences.chinese: 主機門蓋可打開，便於檢修和刀具的更換。

sentences.english: It cost two billion dollars to build this building.
sentences.chinese: 蓋這大樓花了二十億元。

sentences.english: The record store is timestamped to denote the last time it was modified.
sentences.chinese: 記錄存儲被蓋上時間戳來指示它上次被修改的時間。

sentences.english: Mr Geithner appealed for decisive action.
sentences.chinese: 蓋那先生請求採取果斷行動。

sentences.english: Twist off cap, remove quality seal.
sentences.chinese: 打開蓋扭，撕掉瓶口密封。

sentences.english: All Stainless Steel lid, tank, shell, wetted parts and fittings.
sentences.chinese: 全不鏽鋼蓋，罐，貝殼，溼零件及配件。

sentences.english: Rick asks Gaines to pay him for his completed job.
sentences.chinese: 裏克向蓋恩斯要求支付他的酬金，因爲他完成了任務。

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
